thread.title: Fact-checking the 1st Democratic presidential debate

title: Fact-checking the 1st Democratic presidential debate
text: Fact-checking the 1st Democratic presidential debate By Brent Johnson 17 hours 21 minutes ago Font size: TRENTON -- Hillary Clinton, Bernie Sanders, and three other candidates faced off in the first Democratic presidential debate of the 2016 race Tuesday night -- and here is a look at whether their statements hold up to fact-checks by the Associated Press and other media outlets: CLINTON'S EMAIL USE CLAIM: Clinton, who has been under federalâ€¦
